children.value: Effortlessly add Vuetify 3 to your Nuxt project.
Automatically integrates tree shaking via vite-plugin-vuetify or webpack-plugin-vuetify (depending on your build tool).
Automatically imports Vuetify composables into your project
Easily customize SASS Variables used by Vuetify Components

contents.title: Options
contents.description: Configure Vuxtify with the vuxtify property in your nuxt.config.ts file.

children.value: Enables automatic tree shaking for Vuetify, using the method described in the
), the appropriate Vuetify build plugin will be used with the provided options.
If your project is missing the appropriate dependencies, for your build tool, the module will prompt you to install them.

option. This helps your project perform better in light house audits.
Enables the modules debug logger. This will log information about the module's behavior to the console.

contents.title: Composables
contents.description: Vuxtify automatically imports Vuetify composables into your project. This means you can use them in your components without having to import them yourself.

children.value: Vuxtify automatically imports Vuetify composables into your project. This means you can use them in your components without having to import them yourself.
All auto-imported composables are prefixed with a
to avoid naming conflicts with other modules. For example

contents.title: Providers
contents.description: Vuxtify will automatically provide $vuetify on both the server and client side.

children.value: on both the server and client side.
